item.title: WMT
item.description: score:-247 Chances: Walmart (WMT) closed at $157.65 in the latest trading session, marking a +0.05% move from the prior day. Walmart (WMT) is poised to keep its growth story going with its robust store and online operations. Gains from higher-margin ventures, such as advertising, are also noteworthy.
